experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: Teachmint is an Ed-SaaS turned Ed-Tech company providing end-to-end (LMS + ERP) infrastructure solutions to educational institutes. Know more about us at www.teachmint.com𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀• Conducting market research and analyzing data to develop product strategy and prioritizing product ​​roadmaps• Communicating with stakeholders and presenting product updates and progress to internal and external teams• Collaborating with cross-functional teams and incorporating user empathy to drive product innovation and growth• Leading, managing, and motivating product development teams for product launches to achieve business goals and objectives𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗔𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀• Oversaw the entire product lifecycle of a comprehensive reward-based gamification system, boosting the WoW engagement of teachers, parents, and students in the platform by 15%• Spearheaded the launch of Inventory Management for institutes which ensured the onboarding of 80 institutes and increase revenue by 10% within 2months of launch• Implemented A/B testing on personalized push campaigns of Student Practice Questions resulting in a 5-fold increase to an all-time high of 100k unique DAU within 4 months of launch• Orchestrated the development of key product features and improvements for Teachmint web, achieving 80% parity with the app in 2 months and improving cross-platform usability• Built in-app teacher-student library by reusing old code and design elements to help personalize and optimize the organization of different types of learning materials• Collated entry points for product features to create categorized in-app landing pages for teacher, student, and parent personas creating a better UX and overall bringing up the app NPS to 72...
experience.description_html: Teachmint is an Ed-SaaS turned Ed-Tech company providing end-to-end (LMS + ERP) infrastructure solutions to educational institutes. Know more about us at www.teachmint.com𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀• Conducting market research and analyzing data to develop product strategy and prioritizing product ​​roadmaps• Communicating with stakeholders and presenting product updates and progress to internal and external teams• Collaborating with cross-functional teams and incorporating user empathy to drive product innovation and growth• Leading, managing, and motivating product development teams for product launches to achieve business goals and objectives𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗔𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀• Oversaw the entire product lifecycle of a comprehensive reward-based gamification system, boosting the WoW engagement of teachers, parents, and students in the platform by 15%• Spearheaded the launch of Inventory Management for institutes which ensured the onboarding of 80 institutes and increase revenue by 10% within 2months of launch• Implemented A/B testing on personalized push campaigns of Student Practice Questions resulting in a 5-fold increase to an all-time high of 100k unique DAU within 4 months of launch• Orchestrated the development of key product features and improvements for Teachmint web, achieving 80% parity with the app in 2 months and improving cross-platform usability• Built in-app teacher-student library by reusing old code and design elements to help personalize and optimize the organization of different types of learning materials• Collated entry points for product features to create categorized in-app landing pages for teacher, student, and parent personas creating a better UX and overall bringing up the app NPS to 72...

experience.title: Product Internship
experience.description: Uolo is an Ed-Tech company providing learning to K-12 students through their scholastic in-school curricular programs and helping schools administer efficiently through enterprise solutions𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗔𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀• Led, oversaw categories of 'Contests' and 'Online Hobby Classes' bringing up the overall Weekly Active Users (WAU) to around 20k• Implemented new and improved Clevertap marketing campaigns to build awareness and help increase user retention rate by around 5%• Worked closely with design & engineering teams to help improve UX measures that aimed to bring down user drop rate by at least 50%• Performed user, market research, and competitive analysis to introduce new and effective product categories...
